comment.body: Glad to see it mentioned! Don't forget that they've been trying to keep churches shut down over the past year as well. This place seems like a potential last bastion if the censorship gets really bad!

other than DLive I haven't found any IPFS websites worth using, have you? ZeroMe seems like it has more potential for a new social media site than what I've seen on IPFS. I hope more people become interested in building both of them.

Silicon Valley/Technocrats and the Communists think they can take over the world. Truth is, they are scared shitless that the people will fight back. But for better or worse, most people on both sides are far too comfortable to start a hot war, so this could play out over the next hundred years instead of the next few years. If it gets too bad, it could even be a thousand years or more of darkness. This is a very serious time for Humanity.
